title: Make Map Layers With ggplot2
text: goal maplayer provide consistent set functions creating map layers using simple feature ({sf}) data, {ggplot2} package, variety ggplot2 extension packages.

title: Make Map Layers With ggplot2
text: main layers work data location sf object : layer_location_data() layer_location() layer_location_context() several layers can work single sf object input data: layer_markers() layer_numbers() layer_frame() layer_scaled() layer_mask() layer_neatline() Finally, layers require additional packages (listed Suggests): layer_labelled() optionally uses {ggrepel} {geomtextpath} layer_mapbox() uses {mapboxapi} (requires API key) layer_marked() uses {ggforce} layer_icon() uses {ggsvg} layer_inset() uses {patchwork} optionally {figpatch} (stamp_inset_img()) package also allows optional use packages designed transforming spatial data modifying ggplot2 maps. include: {smoothr} (required use smooth_params argument) {ggfx} (required use shadow_params argument) Many functions {maplayer} originally developed {overedge} package {mapbaltimore} package. {overedge} package split three smaller packages including {maplayer}, {getdata}, {sfext}.
